subject: SSN4189
description_text: Hello! I wanted to check on the status of order # SSN4189. Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Bobby Clifford,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our US warehouse is currently out of stock. We have urgently dispatched a batch of goods by air freight to the US warehouse, which is expected to arrive next week on the 3rd. We shall then proceed to dispatch your order.

Hey I wanted to check in about the pedals. Thanks 

>
